featured.text: The angry passengers argued ______ with the airline staff because their flight was cancelled without any reason.
The outdoor concert was canceled because of rain.

definition.zh_def: 取消，終止或撤回某項計劃、活動或訂單。
definition.en_def: To decide that something planned will not happen or to stop an ongoing process.
definition.example: I had to cancel my appointment due to a scheduling conflict.
